roleset.name: to engage in or commit robbery
roleset.note: ROB-V NOTES: Frames file for 'rob' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from rob.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: Seventeen percent reported [their customers]-1 being robbed [*-1].

example.name: passive with adverbials
example.text: In his first year of [*] operating the store [0]he bought [*T*-2] for $ 220,000 [*U*] , [Mr. Ortiz]-1 was robbed [*-1] at least twice at gunpoint .
example.arg: In his first year of [*] operating the store [0]he bought [*T*-2] for $ 220,000 [*U*]
